channel.title: Downloading whonix separatley
channel.description: I don't know if the question may look stupid, but i'd like to know if it is the same to download whonix workstation or whonix gatwey in a different time (i.e. On monday i download Whonix gatwey.... and Saturday I download whonix workstation)... i wanted to know if it is the same or they must be downloaded both all togheter in the sameday to be able to verifie the Key. Thank you.

item.title: Downloading whonix separatley
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Here you go: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Verify_the_Whonix_images

Have a nice day,

Ego

item.title: Downloading whonix separatley

item.description:
Thank you very much. Could i have a link to know how can i verify the iso images?

item.title: Downloading whonix separatley
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

as long as you verify the images, you may download them seperatley whenever you’d like.

Have a nice day,

Ego
